summary:
Adds 2 spells on load game that allow to choose what to equip from
Hymnaru's Clothing Project for S.A.M (SAM Briefs) on target actor or self.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u]
[youtube]kF8E4dhuV54[/youtube]

_Description_[/u][/b]
This mod adds these 2 spells:

1. T71 - Equip Armors - SAM Briefs & Co - Self
2. T71 - Equip Armors - SAM Briefs & Co - Target

on load game that allow to choose what to equip from
[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/forums/topic/5977-rel-hymnarus-clothing-project-for-sam/]Hymnaru's Clothing Project for S.A.M[/url]
(SAM Briefs)
on target actor or self.

[b][u]_Requirements_[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/files/file/1-sam-shape-atlas-for-men-recoded/]S.A.M.[/url]
[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/index.php?/forums/topic/5977-rel-hymnarus-clothing-project-for-sam/]Hymnaru's Clothing Project for S.A.M[/url]
and required mods.

[u][b]_Installation_[/b][/u]
NMM: Click "No" and "Yes To All"
Manual: Unrar and drop the 2 files in data/ overwriting when asked.

[b]Have fun! ^_^
(Please endorse if liked)

_Credits_
Vectorplexus & Hymnaru for their works.[/b][/center]
author: Tiranno71
